contextItems.name: devcontainer.json
contextItems.content:
```/workspaces/EVOLUTION/.devcontainer/devcontainer.json
{
    "image": "mcr.microsoft.com/devcontainers/python:3",
    "remoteUser": "vscode",
    "mounts": [
        {
            "source": "${localEnv:HOME}/.ssh",
            "target": "/home/vscode/.ssh",
            "type": "bind",
            "consistency": "cached"
        },
        {
            "source": "${localEnv:HOME}/.gnupg",
            "target": "/home/vscode/.gnupg",
            "type": "bind",
            "consistency": "cached"
        },
        {
            "source": "${localWorkspaceFolder}/.continue",
            "target": "/home/vscode/.continue",
            "type": "bind",
            "consistency": "cached"
        }
    ],
    "initializeCommand": "sudo mkdir -p ${localWorkspaceFolder}/.continue && sudo chown -R 1000:1000 ${localWorkspaceFolder}/.continue",
    "postCreateCommand": [
        "sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.gnupg /home/vscode/.continue",
        "sudo chmod 700 /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.gnupg /home/vscode/.continue",
        "pip install --upgrade pip",
        "pip install -r /workspace/requirements.txt",
        "/bin/bash /home/vscode/.devcontainer/init.sh"
    ],
    "settingsSync": {
        "configuration": true,
        "fileAssociations": false,
        "ignore": ["*.pyc", "**/node_modules/**"],
        "proxy": false
    },
    "customizations": {
        "vscode": {
            "settings": {
                "python.formatting.provider": "black",
                "python.formatting.blackArgs": [
                    "--line-length",
                    "88"
                ],
                "python.linting.enabled": true,
                "python.linting.pylintEnabled": true,
                "python.linting.flake8Enabled": true,
                "python.linting.flake8Args": [
                    "--max-line-length=88",
                    "--ignore=E203,W503"
                ],
                "python.sortImports.args": [
                    "--profile",
                    "black"
                ],
                "python.sortImports.path": "${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/isort",
                "python.sortImports.organizeImports": true,
                "python.analysis.languageServerMode": "default",
                "python.analysis.indexing": true,
                "python.analysis.autoImportCompletions": true,
                "python.analysis.autoSearchPaths": true,
                "python.analysis.completeFunctionParens": true,
                "python.analysis.typeCheckingMode": "basic",
                "python.testing.pytestEnabled": true,
                "python.testing.unittestEnabled": false,
                "python.testing.autoTestDiscoverOnSaveEnabled": true,
                "python.testing.autoTestLaunchType": "background",
                "python.testing.autoTestLaunchArgs": [
                    "--disable-warnings",
                    "--show-capture=stdout"
                ],
                "python.testing.autoTestLaunchPythonArgs": [
                    "-m",
                    "pytest"
                ],
                "python.testing.pytestArgs": [
                    "--cov=.",
                    "--cov-report=xml",
                    "-v"
                ],
                "coverage-gutters.showGutterCoverage": true,
                "coverage-gutters.showLineCoverage": true,
                "coverage-gutters.showRulerCoverage": true,
                "editor.suggestSelection": "recentlyUsed",
                "editor.tabCompletion": "on",
                "editor.acceptSuggestionOnCommitCharacter": true,
                "editor.acceptSuggestionOnEnter": "smart",
                "editor.quickSuggestions": {
                    "other": "on",
                    "comments": "on",
                    "strings": "on"
                },
                "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
                "editor.suggest.preview": true,
                "editor.suggest.showStatusBar": true,
                "extensions.autoUpdate": true,
                "extensions.autoCheckUpdates": true,
                "git.autofetch": true,
                "git.confirmSync": false,
                "git.enableCommitSigning": true,
                "git.postCommitCommand": "push",
                "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
                "git.autoStash": true,
                "git.autoSync": true,
                "git.name": "Oleg Kizyma",
                "git.email": "oleg1203@gmail.com",
                "update.mode": "default",
                "update.channel": "insiders",
                "remote.extensionKind": {
                    "*": [
                        "workspace"
                    ]
                },
                "dev.containers.defaultExtensions": [],
                "dev.containers.copyGitConfig": false,
                "dev.containers.gitCredentialsHelper": "cache",
                "dev.containers.workspaceMountConsistency": "cached",
                "github.copilot.includeFilePatterns": [],
                "continue.includeFilePatterns": [],
                "terminal.integrated.tabs.title": "${process}${separator}${sequence}",
                "terminal.integrated.tabs.description": "${task}${separator}${local}${separator}${cwd}",
                "terminal.integrated.tabs.separator": " - ",
                "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "bash",
                "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.decorationsEnabled": true,
                "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.enabled": true,
                "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 12,
                "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace",
                "workbench.editor.showTabs": true,
                "workbench.statusBar.visible": true,
                "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
                    "--vscode-editor-foreground": "var(--vscode-editor-foreground)",
                    "--vscode-status-bar-background": "var(--vscode-status-bar-background)"
                },
                "files.associations": {
                    "*.py": "python",
                    "*.yaml": "yaml",
                    "*.yml": "yaml"
                }
            },
            "extensions": [
                "ms-python.python",
                "ms-azuretools.vscode-docker",
                "batisteo.vscode-django",
                "dbaeumer.vscode-eslint",
                "github.copilot",
                "github.copilot-chat",
                "eamodio.gitlens",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-ssh",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-ssh-edit",
                "ms-vscode-remote.remote-explorer",
                "github.vscode-pull-request-github",
                "redhat.vscode-yaml",
                "GitHub.vscode-pull-request-github-actions",
                "continue.continue",
                "saoudrizwan.claude-dev",
                "ryanluker.vscode-coverage-gutters",
                "ms-python.vscode-pylance",
                "ms-python.debugpy",
                "ms-python.black-formatter",
                "ms-python.isort",
                "ms-python.flake8",
                "ms-python.autopep8"
            ]
        }
    }
}
```

content.text: [115102 ms] Start: Run in container: sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.gnupg /home/vscode/.continue sudo chmod 700 /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.gnupg /home/vscode/.continue pip install --upgrade pip pip install -r /workspace/requirements.txt /bin/bash /home/vscode/.devcontainer/init.sh

OCI runtime exec failed: exec failed: unable to start container process: exec: "sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.gnupg /home/vscode/.continue": stat sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.gnupg /home/vscode/.continue: no such file or directory: unknown
[115203 ms] postCreateCommand failed with exit code 126. Skipping any further user-provided commands.

message.content:
Помилка 126 вказує на те, що команда не була знайдена. У цьому випадку, здається, що проблема знаходиться у властивості `postCreateCommand` файлу `devcontainer.json`.

Проблема виникла через те, що у властивості `postCreateCommand` вказано кілька команд, але вони не були правильно розділені. У разі наявності кількох команд вони повинні бути вказані окремими елементами у масиві.

Змініть властивість `postCreateCommand` на такий формат:
```json
"postCreateCommand": [
    "sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.ssh",
    "sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.gnupg",
    "sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.continue",
    "sudo chmod 700 /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.gnupg /home/vscode/.continue",
    "pip install --upgrade pip",
    "pip install -r /workspace/requirements.txt",
    "/bin/bash /home/vscode/.devcontainer/init.sh"
],
```
Також варто перевірити наявність файла `/home/vscode/.devcontainer/init.sh` у контейнері.

Якщо проблема все ще існує, спробуйте виконати команди самостійно у терміналі контейнера, щоб побачити, яку саме команду викликана помилка.
